content.text:
# Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Television Series Drama

The Golden Globe Award for Best Actor – Television Series Drama is an award presented annually by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA). This Golden Globe Award honors the best performance by an actor in a drama television series.
It was first awarded at the 19th Golden Globe Awards on March 5, 1962 to John Charles Daly and Bob Newhart under the title "Best TV Star – Male". In 1969, the award was presented under the new title "Best TV Actor – Drama"; its current title has been used since 1980. The nominees for the award have been announced annually since 1963.
Hiroyuki Sanada is the current recipient of the award for his portrayal of Lord Yoshii Toranaga in Shōgun. Ed Asner, John Forsythe, Jon Hamm, Hugh Laurie and Telly Savalas have won the most awards in this category, each winning twice. Peter Falk and Tom Selleck have both been nominated seven times each, for their respective roles on Columbo and Magnum, P.I..
Winners and nominees
won the first recipient of this award with Bob Newhart in 1961]]
tied with John Charles Daly to be the first recipient of the award.]]
won for Mickey in 1963]]
won the award in 1966 for The Dean Martin Show.]]
won for Mission: Impossible in 1967]]
won in 1970 and received five more nominations for his performance on Mannix as Joe Mannix.]]
won in 1971 playing Jim Phelps on Mission: Impossible.]]
won the award twice for Kojak]]
won for Columbo in 1972 (out of seven nominations).]]
won for Hawkins (1972).]]
won twice for his role as Lou Grant on the eponymous show.]]
was nominated three times for his role as Jim Rockford on The Rockford Files.]]
won in 1981 for his role as John Blackthorne on the miniseries Shōgun.]]
won for playing the title role in Magnum, P.I.. He tied with Peter Falk for having the most nominations in the category.]]
won for Miami Vice (1985)]]
won in 1991 playing Dale Cooper on Twin Peaks]]
won for ''I'll Fly Away (1992)]]
won in 1994 for NYPD Blue]]
received the award for his role in NYPD Blue]]
won for The X-Files]]
won for ER]]
won for The Practice (1998).]]
won in 2000 for playing Tony Soprano in The Sopranos]]
won for Josiah Bartlet on The West Wing (2004)]]
won playing Vic Mackey in The Shield (2002)]]
won twice for playing Gregory House House (2005, 2006).]]
won in 2008 and 2016 for his role as Don Draper on Mad Men.]]
won for playing Nucky Thompson Boardwalk Empire (2010)]]
won for playing a corrupt mayor in Boss (2011)]]
won playing Walter White in Breaking Bad (2014)]]
won playing Frank Underwood in House of Cards (2014)]]
won for This is Us (2017)]]
won for Bodyguard (2018)]]
won for Succession (2019)]]
won for playing Prince Charles on The Crown (2020)]]
won for Yellowstone (2022)]]
won for Succession (2021)]]
won for Succession (2023)]]
Listed below are the winners of the award for each year, as well as the other nominees.
